section.div:
feat(aspect-template.ts): add AspectTemplate class to generate files for creating an aspect feat(aspect-template.ts): add AspectTemplateOptions interface to define options for creating an aspect feat(aspect-template.ts): implement generateFiles method in AspectTemplate class to generate aspect files feat(aspect-template.ts): implement prompt method in AspectTemplate class to prompt user for input feat(aspect-template.ts): implement from method in AspectTemplate class to create an instance of AspectTemplate feat(aspect-user-input.ts): add AspectUserInput type to define user input for creating an aspect feat(default-runtimes.ts): add defaultRuntimes array to define default runtimes for an aspect
feat(aspect-runtime.ts): add aspect-runtime.ts file to generate runtime for aspect feat(aspect-template.ts): add aspect-template.ts file to generate aspect file feat(config-template.ts): add config-template.ts file to generate config file feat(docs-template.ts): add docs-template.ts file to generate docs file feat(index-template.ts): add index-template.ts file to generate index file feat(slot-template.ts): add slot-template.ts file to generate slot file
feat(harmony-templates): add test-template.ts file to generate test files for Harmony components feat(harmony-templates): add eslintConfigFile function to generate eslintrc.js file for Harmony components feat(harmony-templates): add jestConfigFile function to generate jest.config.js file for Harmony components feat(harmony-templates): add prettierConfigFile function to generate prettier.config.js file for Harmony components feat(harmony-templates): add tsConfigFile function to generate tsconfig.json file for Harmony components feat(harmony-templates): add webpackTransformerFile function to generate webpack.config.ts file for Harmony components feat(harmony-templates): add envDocsFile function to generate docs.mdx file for Harmony components
feat(harmony-env-template): add new files for environment template
- Added `env-jsonc.ts` file to define component dependencies and dev dependencies for the environment. - Added `index-file.ts` file to export the environment. - Added `node-env-bit-env.ts` file to define the extended Bit official Harmony environment. - Added `asset.ts` file to declare module types for asset files. - Added `style.ts` file to declare module types for style files.
feat(harmony-env-template): add new template for creating a customized nodejs dev environment feat(harmony-platform-template): add new template for creating an harmony platform to compose business aspects into a unified platform
feat(harmony-templates): add new files and options for Harmony templates
- Added a new file `harmony-templates-options.ts` to define options for Harmony templates. - Added a new file `harmony-templates.docs.mdx` to provide documentation for Harmony templates. - Added a new file `harmony-templates.spec.ts` for testing Harmony templates. - Added a new file `harmony-templates.ts` to create a list of Harmony templates based on the provided options. - Added a new file `index.ts` to export the Harmony templates and related files. - Added a new file `app-file.ts` to generate the platform app file. - Added a new file `backend.ts` to generate the backend types file. - Added a new file `client-mount.tsx` to generate the client mounter file.
The changes were made to enhance the functionality of the Harmony templates by providing more customization options and generating additional files for the templates.
feat(platform-aspect): add platform aspect files
- Add `config.ts` file to define the configuration for the platform aspect. - Add `gateway.ts` file to implement the platform gateway functionality. - Add `index-file.ts` file to export the aspect and its related types. - Add `node-tests.ts` file to write tests for the node runtime. - Add `platform-node.ts` file to implement the platform node runtime functionality. - Add `platform-ui-template.ts` file to implement the platform UI template functionality. - Add `route.ts` file to define the route type and slot for the platform UI.
These files are added to support the platform aspect and its related functionalities.
feat(platform-aspect): add server-mount.ts file to handle server-side rendering of the platform app feat(platform-aspect): add ui-tests.ts file to test the platform UI feat(platform-aspect): add platform-aspect-template.ts file to generate the platform aspect template feat(platform-aspect): add runtime-def.ts file to define the runtime for the platform feat(platform-aspect): add runtime-docs.ts file to provide documentation for the platform runtime feat(platform-aspect): add runtime-impl.ts file to implement the platform runtime feat(platform-aspect): add runtime-index.ts file to export the platform runtime feat(platform-aspect): add runtime-test.ts file for testing the platform runtime
feat(runtime-template.ts): add HarmonyRuntimeTemplate class to generate files for building an harmony runtime environment
The HarmonyRuntimeTemplate class is added to generate files for building an harmony runtime environment. It takes in options such as name, description, hidden, env, and installMissingDeps. The generateFiles method generates the necessary files for the runtime, including the runtime index file, runtime definition file, runtime implementation file, aspect file, and runtime documentation file. The class also includes a static from method to create an instance of the HarmonyRuntimeTemplate class with the provided options.
